title: Create an enterprise asset subtype
content:
Perform the following steps to create an enterprise asset subtype:

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Service Asset & Configuration.

  2. From SACM Home, select Enterprise Asset Subtypes.

  3. Click New.

  4. In the New Enterprise Asset Subtype dialog box, provide all requested information. This dialog requests values for the basic enterprise asset subtype attributes.

    Field Description
    Display label A meaningful name that describes the enterprise asset subtype.
    Process type Optional. Type of the enterprise asset process.

    Full-ownership assets mean the organization or individual has complete ownership and responsibility for the entire lifecycle of the asset. 

    Consumable assets need to be disposed of considering the legal, environmental or regulatory requirement when they are used up or expired.​ For example, office supplies, fuel, and chemicals. Some consumable assets may have expiration dates, so there is a transition from being in stock to disposal.

    Stationary assets typically refer to fixed assets that remain in a fixed location and aren't easily moved. For example, buildings, land, conference rooms, and elevators.

  5. Click   Save on the toolbar.
